title: Mac font file export from Typographer 4.1 on PC
content:
I´ve tried generating every possible kind of font file from Typographer but I just can´t get any of them to install with suitcase on Mac... Please help me with this one. I don´t understand macs that well, but I should know how to install one on a Mac. This however isn´t the case with the files that Fontographer exports. What I´ve got so far are files called:   
   
Font$   
Font.afm   
   
Could someone direct me to a tutorial page or somerhing?
author: helle
